attributes.action: Queen to dissolve parliament and remove  United Kingdom from the European Unions
attributes.background: Politicians having been elected by the people to represent the people and a referendum having been held having been given the mandate to leave the European Union, Parliament has failed in it's duty to the people of this country

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not clear what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Under the Fixed Terms Parliament Act 2011 the Queen cannot dissolve Parliament.

You might like to sign these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235547

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253429

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246387
